entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of showers. Low minus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of showers early this evening. 30 percent chance of showers overnight. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 70 becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 late this evening then light before morning. Low minus 5. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Rain mixed with snow. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Rain or light snow beginning late in the afternoon. Risk of freezing rain late in the afternoon. Wind becoming north 20 km/h late in the afternoon. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning and minus 3 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Rain mixed with snow. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Rain or light snow changing to light snow late in the evening and ending after midnight then cloudy. Risk of freezing rain in the evening. Wind becoming north 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the evening. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 5 in the evening and minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023
